name: Lapis x Labyrinth x Limited Edition
summary:
The limited edition was created for the international release. 
The Nintendo Switch version comes with some extra items. 
 
The Limited Edition for PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch includes: 
- Lapis x Labyrinth 
- Lapis x Labyrinth My Labyrinth Photo Album~♡ 
- Lapis x Labyrinth Dango Beats 
- Collector's Box 
 
The Nintendo Switch version, Limited Edition XL, also contains: 
- Lapis x Labyrinth Poster 
- Mayor's Special Feast Mini Art Print 
- Dango Delights Mini Art Print
